biography.name: Subash Maharjan
biography.title: Software Developer
biography.summary: Result driven Software Developer specializing in crafting scalable, visually polished and efficient web applications using modern frameworks like React, Angular, and Vue, with a deep focus on UI/UX design, performance optimization, and seamless usability and enhanced with AI-powered features that drive smarter user experiences.

experience.description: Engineered accessible and reusable UI components with Angular Material and Syncfusion, accelerating development time across teams by 20% through strategic customization and support collaboration. Developed advanced GIS-based Single Page Applications, significantly enhancing spatial data visualization and user interactivity.

Architected and built an accessible, company-wide component library eliminating redundant UI development efforts Developed a comprehensive design system with Storybook, ensuring consistent UI/UX across applications. Spearheaded the development of a real-time data visualization dashboard using React and D3.js, enhancing data-driven decision-making capabilities. Developed innovative internal tools, including 'Codebank' (code sharing tool) and 'Dependency Matrix (registered for patent), driving organizational innovation and efficiency.

Developed scalable Single Page Applications (SPAs) using Vue3, and AgGrid for real-time performance across large datasets. Collaborated effectively within a large-scale, multi-vendor government subcontracting environment, ensuring seamless module integration. Led cross-functional teams to integrate APIs with frontend interfaces, ensuring seamless functionality and reducing development cycles.

education.description: Major in General Management with a focus on strategic decision-making and organizational leadership. Minor in Accounting, providing a solid foundation in financial principles and practices.
Major in Computer Science with a focus on software development, database management, and web technologies. Developed a strong foundation in programming languages and software engineering principles.

projects.name: Next Portfolio
projects.description: A personal portfolio website showcasing my skills, projects, and professional journey, built with React, NextJs and Tailwind CSS.

projects.name: Codebank
projects.description: An internal tool for code sharing and collaboration within teams, enhancing productivity and code reuse.
